reviews.review: 다음 스토리 언제 나오나

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 это прекрасный образчик того, что сиквел может быть ни чуть не хуже оригинальной игры. Удобный геймплей, приемлемая графика, интересные враги и разумеется захватывающий сюжет с неожиданным концом! Всё это сдобрено атмосферной музыкой от Кейли Бейли, что заставляет нас ещё глубже окунуться в злоключения Гордона Фримена. Моя оценка 80 из 100.
Half-Life 3 must be on it's way!

Star Wars Episode II - The Attack of the Clones was definitely worth Gaben's weight, because it's the same exact game we've played for the past two installments, except for the finale, which everybody hated.

If you own Half Life 2 : EP2 do yourself a huge favor and check out nightmare house 2, http://nh2.wecreatestuff.com/. A horror fps with alot of influence from F.E.A.R but all the little effects and surprises give this game an excellent atmosphere. Definitely worth checking out if you have HL2:EP2.

Я безумно люблю всю серию Half-Life!
Half-Life 2 стала для меня первой игрой от Valve в которую я играл, после того как я впервые прошел игру я был в таком восторге, что сразу же прошел её еще раз, но уже медленно и тщательно, изучая всё что только можно. Позже я прошел первую часть и все дополнения к ней. Когда вышел первый и второй эпизод я переиграл всю серию заного. Игра заслуживает самых высоких похвал и продолжения! Такую превосходную историю нужно продолжать!

Overall: 9/10

While Half-Life 2 perfected the corridor shooter, and Episode One refined that experience, Episode Two takes the series in a new direction with some large outdoor set pieces. It doesn't give the player the free roam of games like Far Cry, but it's still a breath of fresh air compared to its siblings. As usual for a Half-Life game there are many unforgettable "oh my god did you see that?" moments, and it really makes you work hard to save the human race. The conclusion left me feeling physically and mentally exhausted, but also eager for more - so my only criticism is WHERE IS EPISODE THREE?

Continuation of the Half-Life series, Gordon kills more stuff, and solves more simple physics puzzles. Also he gets to throw bombs with the gravity gun. Fun if you like first person shooters, or just the Half-Life franchise.
Recommend?
Another great episode, but I highly recommend playing Half-Life 2 and Half-Life 2: Episode 1 first.
The best thing half-life 2.

This is the "Empire Strikes Back" of the Half-Life 2 saga. New enemies, a gripping storyline, creative level design, and fantastic new music and sfx all come together to wrap up the events of the Citadel. It's a shame that they have seemed to drop the ball on episode 3 because it ends on a bit of a "to be continued..." cliffhanger and would be a great segway into HL3. I would rank this higher than HL2 if it weren't so short just because of how tightly tuned everything is in this episode.
A fantastic end to a series
Awesome game!

Seriously though, you'd have to be a fool to not play half-life 2 ep2 or ep1 or hl2.

Can't possibly recommend an unfinished game that may never get a sequel. Stay away from anything Half-Life 2 related until Episode 3 or part 3 comes out. Very good games, even by today's standards (though not graphically as impressive now as back then, but ending on a cliffhanger that likely has no way of being concluded satisfactorily is every reason to skip these games. Valve is more concerned with TF2 and Dota 2. Let Half-Life die people.
Episode Two poursuit le scénario de Half-Life 2 et se démarque par des environnements extérieurs inédits ainsi qu'une fin intenable pour le fan des aventures de Gordon Freeman...
The sequel to the sequel to probably the best sci-fi first person shooter ever!

Things are starting to become serious! Cool episode. Episode 3 will be awesome for sure! A-

This was the only Half Life game I hadn't played previously.While Episode 1 felt like a large add on extension to Half Life 2, Episode 2 feels like a full out sequel. The story and mythos of the series are unveiled and developed in exciting ways. The threat is greater due to many new enemies, including the primal Hunters and devastating Advisors. The world is wide open and explorable with the use of a car. Everything feels grander due to large maps that frequently change. There are many intense moments that stand out, including the best final battle in the series. This game looks fantastic, giving some great outdoor environments. This game is lengthy, but well paced. This is how FPS's should be!
watch out for antbots they are like bugbots but ants

Wow, this episode was intense, the hunters, the ambushes on the way to white forest, meeting an advisor face to face, the defence of a missle silo against 12 striders and of course the ultimate twist and cliffhanger ending. I cannont wait to see what happens next
STOP DELAYING EPISODE 3 VALVE ARE VERY LAZY :P
Meu Deus!!! Que final é esse!? Esse filme, desculpe, jogo é inacreditável mesmo. Poucas vezes me vi motivado a jogar uma série inteira várias vezes. Half Life conseguiu me convencer.

Cara, na boa... Sem palavras pra esse jogo. Simplesmente, E-S-P-E-T-A-C-U-L-A-R! O melhor de todos os Half-Lifes... Eu até diria, o melhor jogo de aventura de todos os tempos! Varios inimigos novos, cenários totalmente inétidos. Enredo mais envolvente do que nunca, cenas impactantes que puxam um pouco mais para o lado emocional da pessoa e o melhor... Final chocante, cujo mesmo acabou deixando os players com "agua na boca" pelo Episode Three. Um dos jogos mais perfeitos que ja tive o prazer de jogar até o final. Recomendadíssimo, mais que qualquer outro game single player.
O tempo passa e o sentimento continua o mesmo, até hoje, quase dezembro de 2016, HL2:E2 continua sendo, na minha humilde opinião, o melhor game que já tive o prazer de desfrutar até o momento. Sem duvidas, uma verdadeira obra de arte! Não só o EP2, mas também o HL1, HL2 e HL2:E1. Parabéns!

Well diversified and entertaining, it's like everything good from HL2 condensed down into a shorter and more managable segment. The game has lots of unique set moments and frantic fights figuring out how to take down enemies using anything possible. Personally preferred over episode 1.

Até agora, este é o fim de Half-Life. Claro, o final dá uma clara continuação, seja um Half-Life 3 ou um HL2: Episode 3, com certeza vale a pena esperar por. O fim trágico e simplesmente dramático é uma das razões de eu gostar Video-Games: simplesmente foi digno de uma peça teatral (claro, tirando todo o tema sci-fi do jogo). Recomendo, sem mais.

«Второе продолжение» с первых секунд перемещает игрока в неизвестность, которая обволакивает с ног до головы. 
Игра не стремится нагнать страху, заставить почувствовать себя в шкуре Фримена и осознать важность момента, но ей это ненавязчиво и умело удается. Первые же минуты пребывания во вселенной «Полураспада» задают темп и ритм, которые к концу только возрастают: от капающих наземь капель по телу пробегают мурашки, вздрагиваешь от каждого шороха и вглядываешься в силуэты сумрака...

คุณภาพคับแก้ว ทำให้เกมยังคงสนุกเช่นเคย (เผลอๆ จะดีกว่า Half-Life 2 ตัวแรกซะอีก) เสียดายที่ตอนจบทำให้รู้สึกค้างคามากไปหน่อย จนทำให้ต้องคิดอยู่บ่อยๆ ว่า "เมื่อไร Episode 3 จะออกมาสักที"

10/10 (ไม่ใช่คะแนนเฉลี่ย)

Excellent middle chapter for the trilogy that will never be. There's a few hours of solid shootin' and a lot of set-piece moments. This chapter hints at the role of Aperture Science in the HL world. The finale was epic and challenging. Too bad there won't be an episode 3. Maybe they'll pick up where this story ends with Half Life 3(4?). BONUS: There's an excellent mod Nightmare House 2 that can be played if you have this. It's a horror FPS set in a hospital. It's got a lot of good ideas in it, and some recycled, bad ones. Valve needs to give the makers a job!
Play this game (and all the others in the series) all the way through if you want to understand why fans are demanding closure to this very day.
